name: mds-win-shepherd
description: MdsWinShepherd - A comprehensive Windows system management tool with agent-controller architecture for remote PC control and monitoring

scripts.message: echo 'Start services in separate terminals:' && echo '1. npm run agent:dev' && echo '2. npm run controller:dev'
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run message" "npm run dev:agent" "npm run dev:dashboard"
scripts.build: npm run controller:build && npm run agent:build
scripts.install:all: cd agent && npm install && cd ../controller/nextjs && npm install && cd ../controller/electron && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf agent/dist && rimraf controller/nextjs/dist && rimraf controller/electron/dist

author: MdsWinShepherd Team
